blogPost.excerpt: Salad is the easiest, most-trusted way to profit from your PC. Our users (or “Chefs”) turn a wealth of idle compute resources into epic loot—including Steam games, digital subscriptions, in-game loot, gift cards, and more.
blogPost.body: Salad is the easiest, most-trusted way to profit from your PC. Our users (or “Chefs”) turn a wealth of idle compute resources into epic loot—including Steam games, digital subscriptions, in-game loot, gift cards, and more.
blogPost.title: Salad - The easiest, most-trusted way to profit from your PC
blogPost.author: Salad Technologies

localize.description: 沙拉是最简单、最值得信赖的从PC上获利的方式。我们的用户（或称 "厨师"）将大量的闲置计算资源转化为史诗级的战利品--包括Steam游戏、数字订阅、游戏内战利品、礼品卡等。
localize.tagline: 最简单、最值得信赖的从您的电脑中获利的方法。

localize.description: 沙拉是最簡單、最值得信賴的從PC上獲利的方式。我們的用戶（或稱 "廚師"）將大量的閒置計算資源轉化爲史詩級的戰利品--包括Steam遊戲、數字訂閱、遊戲內戰利品、禮品卡等。
localize.tagline: 最簡單、最值得信賴的從您的電腦中獲利的方法。

previous.excerpt: Showtime is a social network for crypto art #NFT: - Discover trending art from Zora, Foundation, Superrare, NiftyGateway, Opensea & more - Explore, like, comment & share crypto art - Sign in with wallet or email to curate your profile and show off your art!
previous.title: Showtime - Discover and showcase your favorite crypto art #NFT

localize.description: Showtime是一个加密艺术的社交网络#NFT：-发现Zora、Foundation、Superrare、NiftyGateway、Opensea等的趋势艺术-探索、喜欢、评论和分享加密艺术-用钱包或电子邮件登录来策划你的个人资料并展示你的艺术!
localize.tagline: 发现和展示你最喜欢的加密艺术#NFT。

localize.description: Showtime是一個加密藝術的社交網絡#NFT：-發現Zora、Foundation、Superrare、NiftyGateway、Opensea等的趨勢藝術-探索、喜歡、評論和分享加密藝術-用錢包或電子郵件登錄來策劃你的個人資料並展示你的藝術!
localize.tagline: 發現和展示你最喜歡的加密藝術#NFT。

next.excerpt: 💸 Z1 is a digital bank for teenagers in LatAm, where they can spend and receive money through a prepaid Mastercard credit card. Z1 gives teenagers autonomy and teaches them financial literacy from their first contact with money all throughout their adulthood✨
next.title: Z1 - Digital bank for teenagers in Latam

localize.description: 💸 Z1是拉丁美洲青少年的数字银行，他们可以通过预付万事达卡信用卡消费和收款。Z1给予青少年自主权，并教会他们从第一次接触金钱到整个成年后的金融知识✨。
localize.tagline: 拉脱维亚青少年数字银行

localize.description: 💸 Z1是拉丁美洲青少年的數字銀行，他們可以通過預付萬事達卡信用卡消費和收款。Z1給予青少年自主權，並教會他們從第一次接觸金錢到整個成年後的金融知識✨。
localize.tagline: 拉脫維亞青少年數字銀行
